user_stories.title: Automated Infrastructure Provisioning
user_stories.story: As a DevOps engineer, I want automated infrastructure provisioning that can create, configure, and manage cloud resources based on application requirements so that I can deploy environments consistently and quickly.
acceptance_criteria: Create cloud infrastructure from configuration files
Automatically configure networking, security, and scaling
Support multiple cloud providers (AWS, Azure, GCP)
Implement infrastructure as code best practices
Provide rollback capabilities for failed deployments

user_stories.title: Intelligent CI/CD Pipeline
user_stories.story: As a CI/CD engineer, I want an intelligent pipeline that can automatically detect changes, run appropriate tests, and deploy to the correct environments so that I can ensure reliable and fast deployments.
acceptance_criteria: Automatically detect code changes and trigger builds
Run tests based on changed components
Deploy to staging/production based on branch/PR
Provide deployment status and rollback options
Integrate with monitoring and alerting systems

user_stories.title: Automated Monitoring and Alerting
user_stories.story: As an SRE, I want automated monitoring that can detect anomalies, predict issues, and automatically resolve common problems so that I can maintain high system availability with minimal manual intervention.
acceptance_criteria: Monitor system metrics, logs, and application performance
Detect anomalies using machine learning
Automatically resolve common issues (restart services, scale resources)
Escalate complex issues to human operators
Provide detailed incident reports and root cause analysis

user_stories.title: Database Management Automation
user_stories.story: As a DBA, I want automated database management that can handle backups, migrations, performance tuning, and scaling so that I can ensure data integrity and optimal performance.
acceptance_criteria: Automated database backups and point-in-time recovery
Schema migration management and rollback
Performance monitoring and query optimization
Automatic scaling based on load
Security compliance and access management

user_stories.title: Security Compliance Automation
user_stories.story: As a security engineer, I want automated compliance checking that can scan infrastructure, applications, and configurations for security vulnerabilities so that I can maintain security standards across all environments.
acceptance_criteria: Scan infrastructure for security misconfigurations
Check application code for vulnerabilities
Validate compliance with security standards (SOC2, ISO27001)
Generate compliance reports and remediation plans
Automatically fix low-risk security issues
